001package gbw.melange.common.shading.services;
002
003
004import java.util.Set;
005
006public interface IShadingPipelineConfig {
007
008
009    enum LogLevel {
010        CACHING_STEP_INFO,
011        COMPILE_STEP_INFO,
012        LIFE_CYCLE_INFO;
013    }
014
015    IShadingPipelineConfig setLoggingAspects(Set<LogLevel> level);
016    Set<LogLevel> getLoggingAspects();
017    boolean getUseCaching();
018    IShadingPipelineConfig useCaching(boolean yesNo);
019    /**
020     * Clear any generated content from the assets/system/generated/shading folder when the program exits.
021     *
022     * @default false
023     */
024    IShadingPipelineConfig clearGeneratedContentOnExit(boolean yesNo);
025
026    boolean getClearGeneratedOnExit();
027    /**
028     * Clear any generated content from the assets/system/generated folder when the program starts.
029     *
030     * @default true
031     */
032    IShadingPipelineConfig clearGeneratedOnStart(boolean yesNo);
033
034    boolean getClearGeneratedOnStart();
035}
